channel.title: Microsoft Visual Basic 2008 Express Edition Help
channel.description:
Hi ive been having some problems with Microsoft Visual Basic 2008 Express Edition. Once I open a New Project it goes well until I actually click Ok and then my Project Starts.
But the Problem is that The Fourm1 File doesn't open at all... And im getting Quite Confused...

item.title: Microsoft Visual Basic 2008 Express Edition Help
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

That Means?
One on a Disk… No

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft Visual Basic 2008 Express Edition Help

item.title: Microsoft Visual Basic 2008 Express Edition Help
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Fat Cookies:

In the top right corner you should be able to right click Form1 and select Show Design and Show Code.

It says:

Value cannot be nulled Parameter name: serviceInstance

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft Visual Basic 2008 Express Edition Help
